entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of a thunderstorm. Local smoke. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 23. POP 30%
